name: Basic Combat Training
description: Learn the essential combat skills needed to survive.
Master the art of combat to become a true warrior!

dialogs.essential_skills: Combat is essential for survival in this world. Let me teach you the basics.
dialogs.night_monsters: When night falls, monsters will spawn. You must be ready to defend yourself.
dialogs.return_reward: Good work! Return to me when you've completed your training for a reward.
